markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Serpent's Tongue](/Feats.aspx?ID=3985) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 49</row>

</column>

---

You subconsciously flick your tongue through the air to taste the world around you. You gain [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) with a range of 30 feet.
name: Serpent's Tongue
